tool.name: groups
tool.command:
parsec groups update_group --group_id "$group_id"
#if $group_name --group_name "$group_name" #end if #if $user_ids --user_ids "$user_ids" #end if #if $role_ids --role_ids "$role_ids" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: group_name
input.help: A new name for the group. If None, the group name is not changed.

input.name: user_ids
input.help: New list of encoded user IDs for the group. It will substitute the previous list of users (with [] if not specified)

input.name: role_ids
input.help: New list of encoded role IDs for the group. It will substitute the previous list of roles (with [] if not specified)
